methods.name: add_instrument
methods.description: Add an instrument to the manager's collection.

parameters.name: instrument
parameters.description: The instrument object to be added.

methods.name: remove_instrument
methods.description: Remove an instrument from the manager's collection.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the instrument to be removed.

methods.name: get_instrument
methods.description: Get an instrument by name from the manager's collection.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the instrument to retrieve.

methods.name: list_instruments
methods.description: List all instruments currently added to the manager.

methods.name: connect_all_instruments
methods.description: Connect all instruments in the manager's collection.

methods.name: disconnect_all_instruments
methods.description: Disconnect all instruments in the manager's collection.

methods.name: is_all_instruments_connected
methods.description: Check if all instruments are connected.

methods.name: is_instrument_connected
methods.description: Check if a specific instrument is connected.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the instrument to check.

methods.name: measure_voltage
methods.description: Perform a voltage measurement.

methods.name: measure_current
methods.description: Perform a current measurement.

methods.name: measure_power
methods.description: Perform a power measurement.

methods.name: measure_eye_diagram
methods.description: Perform an Eye Diagram measurement.

parameters.name: voltage
parameters.description: The voltage for the power supply (default: 1.0 V).

parameters.name: current
parameters.description: The current for the power supply (default: 0.5 A).

parameters.name: eye_duration
parameters.description: The duration of the eye diagram measurement (default: 0.1 s).

methods.name: perform_s21_measurement
methods.description: Perform an S21 measurement.

parameters.name: power_level
parameters.description: The power level for the measurement.

methods.name: calibrate_power_supply
methods.description: Calibrate the power supply.

methods.name: calibrate_oscilloscope
methods.description: Calibrate the oscilloscope.

methods.name: calibrate_vna
methods.description: Calibrate the Vector Network Analyzer.

methods.name: save_measurement_data
methods.description: Save measurement data to a file.

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: The name of the file to save the data to.

methods.name: load_measurement_data
methods.description: Load measurement data from a file.

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: The name of the file to load the data from.

methods.name: configure_power_supply
methods.description: Configure power supply settings.

parameters.name: settings
parameters.description: A dictionary containing power supply settings.

methods.name: configure_oscilloscope
methods.description: Configure oscilloscope settings.

methods.name: configure_vna
methods.description: Configure Vector Network Analyzer settings.

methods.name: check_instrument_compatibility
methods.description: Check if the connected instruments are compatible for the planned measurements.

methods.name: perform_full_system_check
methods.description: Perform a comprehensive system check before starting measurements.

methods.name: report_system_status
methods.description: Generate a report on the status of connected instruments and overall system health.
